headline: Assurant Honors California Veteran Josh Lopez with Mobility-Modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban SUV
summary: ATLANTA, November 10, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, presented a specially-modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban to Marine Sgt. Josh Lopez. The mobility-modified vehicle, presented in partnership with the Assurant Foundation and Wounded Warriors Family Support (WWFS), is part of the WWFS Mobility is Freedom program. content.title: Assurant Honors California Veteran Josh Lopez with Mobility-Modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban SUV
content.summary: ATLANTA, November 10, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, presented a specially-modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban to Marine Sgt. Josh Lopez. The mobility-modified vehicle, presented in partnership with the Assurant Foundation and Wounded Warriors Family Support (WWFS), is part of the WWFS Mobility is Freedom program. The presentation took place la

thumbnail.caption: Assurant, through the Assurant Foundation, teamed with Wounded Warrior Family Support (WWFS) to present combat-wounded veteran Josh Lopez with a mobility-modified 2025 Chevrolet Suburban on November 4, 2025. Pictured left to right: Joshua Sonnier, SVP, Global Program & Product Services, Assurant; Gary Bosses, SVP, Assurant Dealer Services; Joe Surber, Chief Technology Officer, Assurant; Jay Rosenblum, EVP, Chief Legal Officer, Assurant; La Shonda Oglesbee, VP, Global Diversity, Equity & Inclusion, Assurant; Josh Lopez; Maria Lopez, fiancée of Josh Lopez; Dan Lenczner, SVP, Affinity & Commercial Equipment, Assurant; Kelli Ertel, VP, Chief of Staff, Assurant; Isidro Corominas Rubio, VP, Global Business Development, Assurant; and Jeff Strickland, EVP, President Global Automotive, Assurant.
